ACA_Resiliency_AvailabilityZones.explanation: Azure Container Apps Environment should be deployed across multiple availability zones for high availability. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/reliability/reliability-azure-container-apps?tabs=azure-cli

ACA_Private_DisablePublicAccess.explanation: Azure Container Apps Environment should be deployed with public access disabled. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-apps/vnet-custom-internal?tabs=bash&pivots=azure-portal
